strategy_text: In the E-commerce industry, targeting Women aged 25-45, our strategy focuses on enhancing brand visibility and increasing sales revenue. Based on our sales data for Q1 2024, the average revenue generated was $48,049.79 with an average order value of approximately $165.53. To build competitive advantage, we will address the identified weaknesses: high customer acquisition costs (CAC), fluctuating conversion rates, limited Instagram recognition, and low customer loyalty. Our key competitors are 'Zappos' and 'ASOS', known for their robust online presence and customer engagement. To measure performance, we have established KPIs: Revenue Growth with a current value of $48,049.79 aiming for a target of $60,000 in 90 days, Conversion Rate with a current rate of 10.53% aimed to reach 15% in the same timeframe, and Customer Lifetime Value (CLTV) currently at $600, targeting $800 over 90 days. Our budget of $580,000 is allocated across various strategies including content marketing, social media ads, influencer partnerships, and website optimization to increase visibility and conversions within our target demographic.
tactics: Increase social media ads to target Women 25-45
Partner with fashion influencers for wider reach
Revamp the website for better user experience
Host online contests to boost engagement
Increase content marketing efforts to drive organic traffic
